abstract: The collection, whose value is estimated at about $200 million, had already been in display at the school’s Harry Ransom Center. The donation, made by the families of Mr. Dell, Glenn R. Fuhrman and John C. Phelan, will formally cede ownership of the prints to the university.
snippet: The collection, whose value is estimated at about $200 million, had already been in display at the school’s Harry Ransom Center. The donation, made by the families of Mr. Dell, Glenn R. Fuhrman and John C. Phelan, will formally cede ownership of t...
lead_paragraph: The computer billionaire Michael S. Dell and two executives of his private investment firm have agreed to donate an archive of nearly 200,000 prints from the Magnum photo collective to the University of Texas at Austin, the school announced on Friday.

headline.main: Dell-Led Trio to Donate Magnum Photo Archive to University of Texas

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Ransom, Harry, Center, The University of Texas at Austin

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
